headline: Pressure Drop: Reunited at the Brit

content.text: In this first of two clips from the Pressure Drop rehearsals, John (played by Justin Salinger) is reunited with his brother Jack (Michael Gould) and old friend Tony (David Kennedy) at the Brit pub, as they reminisce about the old days.
